Record.ClassificationPath: Hemic and Lymphatic Diseases/Hematologic Diseases/Hemorrhagic Disorders/Vitamin K Deficiency
Hemic and Lymphatic Diseases/Hematologic Diseases/Blood Coagulation Disorders/Vitamin K Deficiency
Nutritional and Metabolic Diseases/Nutrition Disorders/Malnutrition/Deficiency Diseases/Avitaminosis/Vitamin K Deficiency
Record.Description: A nutritional condition produced by a deficiency of VITAMIN K in the diet, characterized by an increased tendency to hemorrhage (HEMORRHAGIC DISORDERS). Such bleeding episodes may be particularly severe in newborn infants. (From Cecil Textbook of Medicine, 19th ed, p1182)
